title: Apple Finds Itself Under Scrutiny in Washington’s Big Tech Clampdown - The Wall Street Journal
content:
1. Apple Finds Itself Under Scrutiny in Washington’s Big Tech Clampdown  The Wall Street Journal
  2. Tech giants recruit defenders among communities of color  POLITICO
  3. Two U.S. Big Tech antitrust bills backed by publisher trade group  Reuters
  4. Will Congress Pass New Regulation on Big Tech? Time May Be Running Out.  The New York Times
  5. Senate committee votes to advance major tech antitrust bill  CNBC
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: CEO Tim Cook has called senators in a vain effort to derail a bill targeting the company’s profitable App Store.
